name: Neil Hannon
description: '''Edward Neil Anthony Hannon''' (born 7 November 1970) is a Northern Irish singer and songwriter. He is the founder and frontman of the [[chamber pop]] group [[the Divine Comedy (band)|the Divine Comedy]], and is the band's only constant member since its inception in 1989. Hannon wrote the theme tunes for the television sitcoms ''[[Father Ted]]'' and ''[[The IT Crowd]]'', as well as the [[Wonka (soundtrack)|original songs]] for the musical film ''[[Wonka (film)|Wonka]]'' (2023).
